 to "translate" means to change, i looked up the word, as in a different la=
nguage in order to understand a different language we must translate it, I'=
m really not sure what it means to happen, I think we just vanish on this s=
ide, and appear on their side, some how.=C2=A0 another dimension? maybe. sf=


 



-----Original Message-----

Sent: Sat, Mar 5, 2011 10:24 pm
Subject: [EVP-=
ITC] Re: Message from David the Tech,

          =C2=A0                    =
              Translated over???
 
 --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Snowfir=
eL@... wrote:
 >
 > Ok, he says "the world wide animal, birds, fish, =
bees, bats, ducks, crabs,  
 > cows,whales, dolphins, buffalo,  etc...de=
aths are going to continue,  it 
 > seems they will all return after abo=
ut 2 or 3 years or so after the permanent  
 > return of Christ to this =
world, this will occur after the antichrist has 
 > all but  destroyed a=
ll life, but JC will come back, and stop him."  David says 
 > that  "th=
e entire animal population may be nearly wiped out before Christ  
 > re=
turns," things are going to only get worse," right now we are all living 
 =
> in  this bubble, thinking it won't happen.
 >  
 > It's very sad=
, I still can't get David to tell me who it is that killing  
 > the cre=
atures, he only says they will all be brought back to earth after JC's 
 &g=
t;  return.  So, stock up on canned food if you can guys, enough to last fo=
r 
 > at  least a year or 2, I buy mine a few extra at a time, and if yo=
u are 
 > translated  over, the food will be there for some one else tha=
t gets stuck here 
 > for that  near 3 years.  I keep hoping to win the =
lotto, like everyone else, 
 > then I  would put lots of food in here fo=
r people so, they don't starve.   I 
 > have  the lake down here, our wa=
ter is from a natural artesian spring 
 > water, it is 250  feet deep so=
, it's pretty safe to drink.  And even if I lost 
 > electricity,  one c=
ould always get some water, from the lake out there which 
 > is private=
  too.  If I leave, anyone stuck here is welcome to come over here 
 > t=
o live,  but you will need to probably keep up with the mortgage if there 
=
 > is still the  bank left.  Whatever, it's going to be pretty bad from =
what I 
 > hear.  sf
 >

n order to understand a different language we must translate it, I'm really=
